name: nej-mocha
description: A test framework specifically for NEJ module system users.

scripts.patch:publish: npm version patch && git push origin master --follow-tags && git push --tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.major:publish: npm version major && git push origin master --follow-tags && git push --tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.minor:publish: npm version minor && git push origin master --follow-tags && git push --tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.test:cli: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node ./bin/nej-mocha --configPath=test/e2e/fixtures/nej-mocha.conf.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test node ./bin/nej-mocha --configPath=test/e2e/fixtures/nej-mocha-not-closing.conf.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:cli
scripts.precommit: npm run build && npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run test:cover && git add .

author: AndyRightNow
